body_html:
@lanpa , I am currently working on a large video dataset and it is almost impossible to check every frame of every video in advance. Thus, I have to handle the exceptions on-the-fly.
I have tried your suggested method and add an extra flag variable to control if we should skip these exceptions or just keep the original way. It works exactly what I want. Thank you.

body:
@lanpa , I am currently working on a large video dataset and it is almost impossible to check every frame of every video in advance. Thus, I have to handle the exceptions on-the-fly.
I have tried your suggested method and add an extra flag variable to control if we should skip these exceptions or just keep the original way. It works exactly what I want. Thank you.
